app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Voice Recorder Memo App
app_description: The BEST Voice Recorder for iPhone and iPad! Voice Recorder allow you to record voice memos at unlimited length with high quality. Voice Recorder can record directly in MP4 AAC and share with email and other ways. Features: Unlimited recording time Auto save for never losing any voice memo Useful file voice list management system Loop and shuffle playing mode Share Audio via email and other ways Skip backwards forwards 15 seconds Stunning user interface designed and easy to use Voice Recorder must be your best choice for recording anything in your life!
